name: Silk Road
owner: David Camilo Diaz Mera  Nicole Hong, http://www.wsj.com/articles/silk-road-creator-found-guilty-of-cybercrimes-1423083107?mod=WSJ_hp_RightTopStories "Silk Road Creator Found Guilty of Cybercrimes," ''Wall Street Journal'', 4 February 2015.
